Form.Description: Settings that affect the Forum Addon

SiteProperty.caption: Segregate Private Forums
SiteProperty.name: Forums - Segregate Private Forums
SiteProperty.Description: When checked, forums will be divided into two lists, Public Forums and Private Forums.

SiteProperty.caption: Allow Profile
SiteProperty.name: Forums - Allow Profile
SiteProperty.Description: When checked, authenticated users will see an update profile button. They can manage their identity and signup for forum update emails.

SiteProperty.caption: Profile Block Update Group
SiteProperty.name: Forums - Profile Block Update Group
SiteProperty.Description: When Allow Profile is checked, people in this group can not update their profile.

SiteProperty.caption: Allow Notifications
SiteProperty.name: Forums - Allow Notifications
SiteProperty.Description: When checked, the profile form will include a section for Forum Notifications. Forum Notifications allow users to be notified of new posts or comments to select forums.
